summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Sourcing Agent Orchestrator UI. All major features working correctly including sidebar functionality, job navigation, candidate table with multi-select, outreach dialog flow, and sourcing tabs. Chat panel and pipeline stepper also functional.
passed_tests: Sidebar collapsed by default with only icons visible
Job listing page loads with exactly 5 job cards
Sourcing Workflow header without AI subtitle
Candidate table displays all required columns (Candidate, Current Role, Experience, Match Score, Actions)
Match scores show proper labels (Very High, High, Medium) with percentages
Floating action bar appears when candidates selected with correct count
Outreach dialog opens with all 3 channel options (WhatsApp, Email, LinkedIn)
Message builder with pre-filled job details working
Message contains all required job information (title, location, company, apply link)
Send message flow with confirmation working
Back button in message builder returns to channel selection
All 4 sourcing tabs functional with correct candidate counts
Chat panel visible with co-pilot messages
Pipeline stepper with all stages visible
